title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh and healthy salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese.

title: Beef Bourguignon
summary: French beef stew braised in red wine with carrots, onions, and mushrooms.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic homemade cookies with melty chocolate chips and crispy edges.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: Quick and healthy stir fry with mixed vegetables and soy sauce.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Crispy taco shells filled with seasoned beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

title: Berry Smoothie Bowl
summary: Thick smoothie bowl topped with fresh berries, granola, and honey.
